title: Hi ! Can my Laptop Run league smoothly ? PLEASE HELP
body:
_Thank you ^^ in advance_
Hi I'm wondering if my new Laptop could run league of legends smoothly (I mean like 30-40 FPS on low settings)
I've - Intel Celeron Processor (1.4 GHz, 2MB L3 Cache)
.......-4 GB DDR3 L Memory 
.......-Intel HD Graphics
**:( Please tell me my CPU won't affect my gameplay ? **

replies.body: It wouldn't be fair to you for me to suggest what will work for you.  It would be pretty shitty if I said yes, but it ends up being a crappy decision.  :/  What I can recommend, though, is our [recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide!  This can help towards making a choice best fit for you.  Hope it helps!

......At long as you don't have other things running in the background then you should able to run it W/ some little problem. During team fights, it can cause some FPS Spake(Drop to ~5 for a second). This can be dangerous because FPS Drop can result in a client/game crash.

PS: Your loading screen with take very long to load, but overall if you are just aiming for some fun normal games then it shouldn't be a big problem.
